extendedInfo.description: Are you a Super Car fan !  If yes then this app is for you.Design your dream car is the best sketch, designing learning & fun apps in Android market till date.Super Cars are dream car for everyone .Super Cars, Hybrid Cars ,Racing Cars , Formula one racing cars makes you very exiting .In this Apps you will learn how to draw top super cars & you can surprise everyone .Design your dream car is a fun app also, you will find a step-by-step instructions how to draw  high speed cars, supersonic cars .Each drawing divided in 10 to 20 steps, and its very easy to follow to complete the picture.Learn how to draw will improve your skill in very less time with the help of our simple android application. Whether you're an art teacher, art student, or just a hobbyist artist you will find the step by step education that will give you the ability to bring those images in your mind into paper reality .Even kids can also use this & they will learn a lot with lots of fun. Design your dream car is best app which show you how to draw super cars, Sports cars which helps to advance your skills to becoming a better artist .So go ahead and try and draw, because no matter what you choose to do, you are guaranteed to achieve your artistic goals. Have fun everyone!Learn to draw with How to Draw : Design your dream car like a personal art teacher, it will teach you how to draw dozens of different super cars and create amazing pictures.Main Features :â¢ Easy drawing: No need of any special skills, just start drawingâ¢ Interesting to draw : try different styles of drawings â¢ Lots of fun & learningâ¢ Each drawing is divided into a number of steps which are easy to follow.â¢ You can create your own drawing and draw right on the screen.â¢ No tensions for parents because they can use it to give drawing lessons to their kids.After finishing picture you can share it on Facebook & get lots of compliments.Here is few names of Super cars you are going to draw â-	Bugatti Veyron Super Sport-	Hennessey Venom-	Koenigsegg Agera-	McLaren F1-	Lamborghini Aventador-	LaFerrari-	2015 Lamborghini Veneno Roadster-	Rolls Royce-	SSC Ultimate Aero TT-	Saleen S7-	Koenigsegg CCX-	Mercedes Benz SLR-	Pagani Huayra-	Gumpert Apollo-	Ascari A10-	Ferrari EnzoWe don`t stop with Design your Super Cars , more categories of drawing are lined up like â-	Sketch your cartoon characters : How to draw your favorite cartoons-	Design your own body tattoo : How to draw tattoos-	Sketch your favorite Guns : how to draw favorite animals-	Sketch your favorite animals : How to draw your favorite animals-	Sketch your Monster mask : How to draw monster masks-	Sketch your favorite celebrity-	Many more drawings in all category  You can learn step on this link also :https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2wKI2XN7nuk
